title: Introduction to C Programming
description: C programming language is a high-level structured programming language that is widely used for developing applications ranging from operating systems to video games.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Algorithms are a set of instructions that are designed to solve a specific problem or complete a task. They are an essential part of computer science and are used in various fields to process information.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: C++ is a high-level programming language that is widely used for developing operating systems, database, video games, and other software applications.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Data structures are essential components of computer science that enable efficient and effective handling of data in various applications, including algorithms, databases, and software development.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) in Python is a programming paradigm that focuses on using objects to design and build applications, allowing for better code organization, reusability, and extensibility.

title: Software Engineering
description: Software Engineering is the process of designing, building, testing, and maintaining software applications using well-structured methodologies and tools.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: AWS (Amazon Web Services) is a leading cloud computing platform offering a wide range of scalable and flexible services for computing, storage, database, and analytics needs.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: MySQL is an open-source, relational database management system. It is widely used for web applications, storing data for content management systems, e-commerce platforms, etc.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: With effective problem-solving skills, individuals have the ability to identify, analyze, and ultimately resolve a wide range of personal and professional challenges.
